article.title: Chapter Spotlight
article.author: SIGNAL Staff
article.text: If you're interested in having your chapter's noteworthy activities highlighted in the Chapter Spotlight section of SIGNAL Connections, contact Katie Packard, assistant editor.Â Check out the April issue of SIGNAL Magazine, in the mail to AFCEA members and subscribers April 1, 2009. For more information about joining AFCEA or subscribing to SIGNAL, contact AFCEA Member Services.Visit Member Services' Region and Chapter Information page to read about noteworthy chapter events.
